text: ðŸš¨ Measles Update! ðŸš¨Did you know that accelerated immunization activities have prevented an estimated 57 million deaths from measles between 2000-2022? ðŸ¤¯ Routine vaccination and mass campaigns in high-case countries are key to reducing global measles deaths.In 2022, 74% of children received both doses of the measles vaccine, and about 83% received one dose by their first birthday. ðŸŽ‰The Measles & Rubella Partnership (formerly the Measles & Rubella Initiative), supported by organizations like Gavi, has been crucial in preventing measles deaths, mostly in the WHO African Region and Gavi-supported countries.Let's keep up the good work! ðŸ’ª The Immunization Agenda 2030 Measles & Rubella Partnership is working towards achieving measles and rubella specific targets. ðŸš€#Measles
